channel.title: Redirect Help Button to URL in New Tab
channel.description:
### Issue Summary
I am looking to redirect the "Help" button on the left side navigation to a different url with custom documentation. I would like this to be opened in a new tab, rather than the iFrame it currently uses.
Is there a simple way to accomplish this in the source code? Thank you!
### Technical details:
* Redash Version: 10.1.0 * Browser/OS: chrome v97.0.4692.71 / macos v11.6.2 * How did you install Redash: contrib-helm-chart

item.title: Redirect Help Button to URL in New Tab
item.dc:creator: mains
item.description:
Issue Summary

I am looking to redirect the “Help” button on the left side navigation to a different url with custom documentation. I would like this to be opened in a new tab, rather than the iFrame it currently uses.

Is there a simple way to accomplish this in the source code? Thank you!

Technical details:

  • Redash Version: 10.1.0
  • Browser/OS: chrome v97.0.4692.71 / macos v11.6.2
  • How did you install Redash: contrib-helm-chart

Read full topic
